dc_description_s: This data represents bear hunting management zones for WI in 2014.[This data set is a region features shapefile representing Wisconsin DNR Bear Management Zones as region features. Bear Management Zones indicate the areas with various bear hunting regulations throughout Wisconsin. Hunting regulations may vary between and within zones. Users should consult the most recent Hunting Regulations Handbook to determine which regulations apply to which zones, or portions of zones. Bear Management Zones allow the DNR to better control the distribution of hunters and shift hunting pressure to areas of high nuisance and/or damage complaints.]
uw_supplemental_s: The data for this shapefile was collected over a range of dates from 1996 to 2019.Augmented original metadata with UW-Madison specific elements. For complete metadata documentation, please visit https://data-wi-dnr.opendata.arcgis.com/datasets/bear-hunting-management-zones
